verses.content: Pathien chu tho sienla, ama dotuhai chu sukdarin um raw se, Ama theidatuhai khawm chu a hmaah tlânse raw se.
Meikhu hi lên hmanga a um ang hin, anni chu lên hmang la; Khuoihlu hi mei luma ân tuihmang angin, Mi rilohai chu Pathien hmaah bohmang raw se.
Mi felhai ruok chu lâwmtakin um sienla, Pathien hmaa hlim raw hai se; Anih, lâwmtakin hlim raw hai se.
Pathien chawimawiin hla sak unla, a hming inpâkin sak ro; Tawlailîr thlalêrhai fethleng ding ta ding chun lamlien ding sung pâwng unla, A hming chu JAH a nih, a hmaa chun hlim ro.
Pathien a umna inthienga um chu, Pa nei lohai pa le hmeithaihai ngaituotu a nih.
Pathien chun mi malhai chu sûngkuo laiahai ân ṭhangtir hlak a; Mi intânghai chu a ṭhuoi suok a, vângneinaah a ṭhuoi lût hlak: Helhmanghai ruok chu ram ṭâwlah an um hlak.
Aw Pathien, i mihai hma ṭhuoia i hung suok a, Thlalêra i fethleng lai khan,
Hnuoi hi ân hnîng dur dur a, Vânhai khawm khi Pathien hmaa chun a far a, Sinai tlâng meu khawm saw Pathien hmaah, Israelhai Pathien hmaa chun ân hnîng dur dur kha.
Aw Pathien, nang chun ruo tamtak în sûrtir a, I rochan chu a chau lai khan i sukdet a.
I rawihai chun chutaka chun umhmun an khuor a, Aw Pathien, nang chun i ṭhatnain rimsihai ta dingin i buotsai a.
LALPAIN thu chu a pêk hlak a, Chanchin hriltu nuhmeihai chu pâwl lientak an nih.
Sipaihai lalhai chu an tlânsie an tlânsieh a, In nghâktunu chun râllâk sum chu a sem a.
Vaṭhu thla tangkaruoa tuoma, A thla hmawr khawm rângkachak engtaka tuom angin, Berâm huon kârahai dâm i zâl ding am a nih?
Iengkimthawtheiin chutaka chun lalhai chu a sukdar lai chu, Zalmon tlânga vûr sûr lai ang a nih.
Basan tlâng chu Pathien tlâng a na, Basan tlâng chu tlâng insângtak a nih.
Tlâng insângtakhai, Pathienin a umna dinga a tlâng dit chu, Iengdinga îtthika in mel am a na? Anih, LALPA chu chutaka chun kumkhuoin a um zing ding a nih.
Pathien tawlailîr chu a sînga sîng, a sânga sâng tamtak a nih. LALPA chu Sinai tlânga a um ang khan, chuong laia chun hmun inthiengah a um tah.
Nang chu chungtieng i hang feh a, i manhai chu salah i ṭhuoi a, Mihriemhai lai chun thilpêkhai i dawng a, Anih, helhmanghai lai khawm, LALPA Pathien chu an kuoma a um theina dingin.
LALPA ei phur ni tina a mi phurpêktu, A mi sandamtu Pathien chu inpâkin um raw se.
Pathien chu ei ta dingin sanhimtu, Pathien a nih, Thinaa inthawka suoknahai chu LALPA Jehovah ta a ni bawk.
Nisienlakhawm, Pathienin ama dotuhai lu chu sât khawi phawk a tih, A thiemnawnaa la fe pei, lu vun sam inbuktak chu.
LALPAIN, “Basan rama inthawkin ṭhuoi nâwk ka ta, Tuisuoriet mawng inthûktaka inthawk chu ṭhuoi nâwk ka tih.
I ke chu thisena i phûm thei a, I ui leihai chun i dohaia inthawk chan a nei theina dingin,” a ta,
Aw Pathien, i fe lai dâm an hmuh a, Ka Pathien ka Laltak hmun inthienga a fe laihai chu.
Nunghâk khuongtê benhai laia chun, Hlasaktuhai an fe hmasah a, iengkhat mûttuhai chun an zui a.
Inkhâwmnaahai hin Pathien inpâk unla, Israel tuihnâra suokhai, LALPA chu inpâk ro.
Chutaka chun nau mitlum Benjamin an rorêltu a um a, Judahai mi lien le an upahai, Zebulunhai mi lienhai, Naphtalihai mi lienhai leh.
I Pathien chun i thilthaw- theina chu thu a pêk a, Aw Pathien, kan ta dinga thil i mi thawpêk chu sukhrât rawh.
Jerusalema i biekin leiin, Lalhaiin lâwmmanhai la hung chawipêk an ti che.
Tangkahai chu sirin, Phairuong laia sahrâng chu kâwk la, Bâwngchal tamtak, mi tin bâwngtêhai leh, Indo inhâwk mi tin chu a sukdar tah a.
Aiguptaa inthawkin mi lienhai hung suok an ta, Ethiopiahai chu an kut Pathien tienga phar dingin inhmâwng an tih.
Leihnuoi ramhai, Pathien chawimawiin hla sak unla, Aw LALPA inpâkin hla sak ro.
Vânhai vân, tiena umhai chunga chuong chu, Ngai ta, a râwl ân suo ie, râwl nasatak el chu.
Pathien kuoma chun hrâtna pe ro, A ropuina chu Israelhai chungah a um a, A hrâtna chu vân dumhaia khin a um.
Aw Pathien, i hmun inthieng- haia inthawk chun ṭi i um a; Israelhai Pathien, ama ngei chun a mihai kuomah hrâtna le thilthawtheina a pêk hlak. Pathien chu inpâkin um raw se.
